I am a Cybersecurity Specialist and Ethical Hacker with expertise in both offensive and defensive security. I use my web development background to understand systems from the inside out.
I value practical skills above all else. I am committed to continuous learning, constantly testing my abilities against new security challenges.
Beyond personal growth, I focus on sharing knowledge. I've created structured cybersecurity learning paths and helped modernize education to ensure others can build the real-world skills needed in this field.
I welcome opportunities to connect and collaborate with like-minded people.
